artifacts.summary: Non-constructive saturation via Zorn's lemma with 1 sorry in existence proof

completion_data.completion_summary: Implemented non-constructive multi-family saturation construction using Zorn's lemma. Provides mathematically principled alternative to axiom-based approach. One sorry remains in existence proof (Zorn's lemma formalization). Axiom kept as fallback until sorry is resolved.

next_steps: Formalize Zorn's lemma proof in exists_fullySaturated_extension to fully eliminate the axiom
